title: martymcfly65
author: martymcfly65
content: hello i am new here.i need a 300 usd loan, i have a freebitco.in account and have 145k fun tokens(1000 usd ,staked until march 2023).  İ can give you my freebitcoin account as a collateral.i will pay you 1 month later.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: martymcfly65 on October 05, 2022, 06:08:13 PMhello i am new here.i need a 300 usd loan, i have a freebitco.in account and have 145k fun tokens(1000 usd ,staked until march 2023).  İ can give you my freebitcoin account as a collateral.i will pay you 1 month later.Once you receive you will leave the forum and/or you will come with another account and ask once again.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: martymcfly65 on October 05, 2022, 06:08:13 PMİ can give you my freebitcoin account as a collateral.In connection with your response on the local board, even if someone adds 2FA and changes the email, you can still override those things with a simple signed message from an address that was previously connected to the account in question.- What is considered collateral?
